features.additionalInfo: An overdraft is a revolving credit facility so you can continue to access funds as and when you need.
There are no fixed repayments, unlike a term loan or business loan.
Manage unexpected expenses, or cover the cash flow gap between receiving payments from customers and paying your suppliers.

features.additionalValue: Get extra funds when you need
features.additionalInfo: Access your overdraft just like you would funds in your business account, using an ATM, Netbank, CommBiz, EFTPOS, cheque, over the phone, in branch and the CommBank app.
Only pay interest on the balance of your overdraft.
No need to make regular repayments.

constraints.additionalInfo: The maximum overdraft amount is $250,000 for unsecured overdrafts

eligibility.additionalInfo: Subject to eligibility and credit criteria, a business overdraft may be suitable for businesses of any size with a cash flow need, including: sole traders, partnerships, trusts, limited or proprietary limited companies.

eligibility.additionalValue: You can apply if your business is:
eligibility.additionalInfo: A registered Australian business that includes sole traders, partnerships, trusts, limited or proprietary limited companies and if you are seeking a loan for business purposes only

eligibility.additionalValue: You're more likely to be approved if:
eligibility.additionalInfo: You haven't been overdrawn or had your account in arrears anytime in the past 3 months.

eligibility.additionalValue: You're more likely to be approved if:
eligibility.additionalInfo: You haven't been declared bankrupt in the last 5 years.

eligibility.additionalValue: You're more likely to be approved if:
eligibility.additionalInfo: You haven't had any accounts in collections in the past 6 months.

fees.name: Establishment fee
fees.additionalValue: Fee charged may vary due to a number of factors relating to the application.
fees.additionalInfo: A one-off establishment fee when you open your overdraft. We'll waive this fee if you're eligible to apply online. Other fees and charges may apply.

fees.name: Overdraft line fee
fees.additionalInfo: A regular Overdraft Line Fee charged Monthly. Fees charged may vary due to a number of factors relating to the application.

fees.name: Overdraft line fee
fees.additionalInfo: A regular Overdraft Line Fee charged Quarterly. Fee charged may vary due to a number of factors relating to the application.

fees.name: Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The amount and frequency of each fee depends on your individual circumstances and the other options you choose.

lendingRates.additionalValue: Advertised interest rates may vary depending on individual application circumstances. Rates and fees are subject to change. Fees, charges, T&Cs and eligibility criteria apply.
Advertised interest rates may vary depending on individual application circumstances. Rates and fees are subject to change. Fees, charges, T&Cs and eligibility criteria apply.
Advertised interest rates may vary depending on individual application circumstances. Rates and fees are subject to change. Fees, charges, T&Cs and eligibility criteria apply.
Advertised interest rates may vary depending on individual application circumstances. Rates and fees are subject to change. Fees, charges, T&Cs and eligibility criteria apply.
Advertised interest rates may vary depending on individual application circumstances. Rates and fees are subject to change. Fees, charges, T&Cs and eligibility criteria apply.

data.name: Business Overdraft
data.description: Access additional funds directly from your business transaction account, to manage your business cash flow or unexpected expenses.
